name: Mud Volcano
description: A bubbling mud volcano creates a unique landscape and potential source of valuable minerals, but the unstable ground and toxic gases make it extremely dangerous. The mud can preserve organic materials, while the constant activity indicates underlying geothermal energy.
atmosphere: Unique landscape of bubbling mud and geothermal activity. Constant movement and potential danger. Warm air scented of earth and minerals. Unstable ground and toxic gases create extreme danger. Constant activity indicates underlying geothermal energy. Bubbling creates natural power and energy feeling.
